content.prompt: The precise arrangement and orientation of the megaliths of Stonehenge suggest that the site was used for the

choices.label: calculation of the positions of the planets
performance of a ceremony dedicated to a lunar deity
commemoration of the creation of the Heavens

topic.text: 1.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
